isis.stitle: BP-R1 BOBTAIL BRAKE PROPORTIONING RELAY VALVE AND LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE - INSTALL

svcproc.title: LQ-5 AND BP-R1 VALVE
svcproc.para: If the vehicle has a front axle ratio or limiting valve (such as the Bendix LQ-4), it can be replaced with an LQ-5. The LQ-5 control port must be connected to the trailer supply line. Also, a quick release valve must be installedbetween the LQ-5 delivery and the front axle brake chambers.

caution.para: Do not replace the BP-1 front brake proportioning valve with the LQ-5. The LQ-5 will not function properly in the BP-1 system.

step1.para: Install all air line fittings and plugs, making certain thread sealing material does not enter the valve.
Install the assembled valve on the vehicle.
Connect all air lines to the valve using the identification made during valve removal step 3.
